categories: Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic starships

nodes.text: Logan was a pair of stormtrooper transports used by the Rebel Alliance. They were part of a strike force against the Imperial frigate Laantis, with the transports launching warheads at the frigate. The transports along with the other Rebels were defeated and the transports were destroyed.
This article assumes "Medium" difficulty. In "Hard" the flight group increases to four transports.
